public service.translation[0].definition: a service, such as transport or health care, that a government provides
efforts to improve quality in public services
a service provided to people because it will help them, and not for profit
Local TV stations ran the ads as a public service.
staff cuts in the public service
He left the public service and embarked on a career in the City.
public service.translation[1].definition: a service that a government provides, such as the police, the health service etc and which is paid for by taxation
He must show a willingness to spend more on health, education and other public services.

a service provided to people because it will help them, and is not for profit
